A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Cohesive story? Nope.   Good dialog? nope Character development?  nearly none.    Pacing/editing?  Independence day was an Oscar winner by comparison.  The movie neglected to deliver on nearly every item a star wars fan was  looking forward to after the Force Awakens.    The critics who gave this a 91%?  i can only assume they read a plot summary and watched a few trailers.
